request.schema: [{"name":"guest_email","label":"Guest email","type":"string","control_type":"text","optional":false,"hint":"Guest email address"},{"name":"guest_first_name","label":"Guest first name","type":"string","control_type":"text","optional":false,"hint":"Guest first name"},{"name":"guest_last_name","label":"Guest last name","type":"string","control_type":"text","optional":false,"hint":"Guest last name"},{"name":"guest_phone","label":"Guest phone","type":"string","control_type":"text","optional":true,"hint":"Guest phone number"},{"name":"room_number","label":"Room number","type":"string","control_type":"text","optional":false,"hint":"Hotel room number"},{"name":"check_in_date","label":"Check-in date","type":"date","control_type":"date","optional":false,"hint":"Guest arrival date (ISO 8601)"},{"name":"check_out_date","label":"Check-out date","type":"date","control_type":"date","optional":false,"hint":"Guest departure date (ISO 8601)"},{"name":"number_of_guests","label":"Number of guests","type":"number","control_type":"number","optional":true,"hint":"Total guests in party (default: 1)"},{"name":"special_requests","label":"Special requests","type":"string","control_type":"text","optional":true,"hint":"Guest requests or notes"},{"name":"booking_external_id","label":"Booking External ID","type":"string","control_type":"text","optional":true,"hint":"Idempotency token for Booking__c.External_ID__c (UUID)"}]
